title: Smudge's Adventures
description: Smudge & Pod, two ordinary cats, live their best lifes in Cat Kingdom. But their adventures are interrupted by Evil Cat, the demonic leader of the evil kitty army, who sets out plans to defeat Smudge for good.

embed_links.title: Movie (Season 1: All Episodes)
embed_links.description: When Evil Cat sets out plans to kill Smudge once and for all, Smudge & Pod set out on random adventures to defeat Evil Cat and live their happy lifes.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E1: On the Beachside
embed_links.description: Smudge takes Pod to the beach to have a relax, but when a storm comes, the two must find a safe place to take cover at.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E2: Teleport Today
embed_links.description: When Pod meets the new girl in school, he falls in love very quickly, but to win her heart, He must compete in the Dodgeball tournament, but he needs Tinkerbell's help.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E3: Big Prom Blowout
embed_links.description: Pod prepares for his school prom dance with his crush, but when Evil Cat interrupts the party, he threatens Pod to take his crush forever.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E4: No Crash Intended
embed_links.description: Still healing from the prom dance, Pod and Smudge get an alert on the highway that there's a bad gang hurting innocent people, so they set out to stop them in style.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E5: Rockin' It
embed_links.description: Pod wants to start his own band but Smudge doesn't like the idea, so the two have a really loud argument.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E6: Do You Really Love Me?
embed_links.description: Smudge & Holly's relationship is tested when she asks him the ultimate question, Meanwhile, Pod's school goes through a lockdown.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E7: Not Cool, Pod
embed_links.description: Smudge & Tinkerbell take a trip to the angel cats to have a speak with the leader, But they are attacked by the demons, Meanwhile, Pod is told that he's not cool for singing a bad song.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E8: Welcome to the Finish Line
embed_links.description: Evil Cat attacks Pod's new helicopter, damaging him in the result, when Smudge gets the news, he sets out to defeat Evil Cat.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E9: Get Out
embed_links.description: The doctor for Pod doesn't believe that Smudge & Tinkerbell are relatives and force them to get out when they try to see him, and Smudge starts to believe that everything that's happened is his fault.

embed_links.title: Smudge's Adventures S1E10: Friendship on the Line
embed_links.description: Smudge, Pod & Tinkerbell prepare for the final fight against Evil Cat.

title: Dystopian Cats
description: When the evil kitty army decides to attack an Innocent country and make it a dystopian country, Darcy and her best friends, the only cats left in the country, decide to take matters into their own paws and recover the country before Mayor Mittens decides to end the country forever.

embed_links.title: Dystopian Cats S1E1: Shattered Sanctuary
embed_links.description: On the day of the devastating attack, young Darcy is forced to hide with her parents, only to have them cruelly taken away, leaving her alone and terrified in the decimated ruins of her once peaceful home.
